alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; Northern Tangipahoa; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 04 at 3:23AM CST until January 04 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures at or below 25 expected. * WHERE...In Mississippi, Wilkinson, Amite, Pike and Walthall Counties. In Louisiana, Pointe Coupee, West Feliciana, East Feliciana, St. Helena, Washington and Northern Tangipahoa Parishes. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; Northern Tangipahoa; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; Washington; West Feliciana
